thread.section_title: Sports - BC Democrat Online - Las Animas, CO
thread.title: LAHS Athletes of the Week

title: LAHS Athletes of the Week
text: LAHS Athletes of the Week Comment   Writer Posted Oct. 19, 2015 at 6:00 AM Posted Oct. 19, 2015 at 6:00 AM Caylan Garcia and Lauren Spady have been selected the Las Animas High School Athletes of the Week for the week of Oct. 15. LAHS football coaches said of Garcia, “Caylan played hard on defense and shut down any run attempts up the middle. The opposing team would double-team Caylan and try to stop him. Good job, Caylan. Keep up the good work!” Of Spady, LAHS volleyball coaches commented, “She is a hard worker, comes in ready for practice every day and she keeps improving. She understands the rules of the game and earned her spot as a captain on C-team.”   Writer
